original_text: Jesus and his disciples sailed over to the other side of the lake. His disciples forgot to take any bread with them.
korean_text: 제자들이 건너편으로 갈새 떡 가져가기를 잊었더니

sentences.original_text: sailed over to the other side of the lake
His disciples forgot to take any bread
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 제자들은 빵을 가져가는 것을 잊었다
